logout.title: Sign out of your account?

brand.name: Tobby

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Let Tobby help you manage your finances

advancedAnalytics.name: Advanced Analytics
advancedAnalytics.description: Deep insights into your spending patterns with custom reports and trends

exportData.name: Export Data
exportData.description: Export your expense data to CSV or PDF for accounting and tax purposes

budgetAlerts.name: Budget Alerts
budgetAlerts.description: Set spending limits and receive real-time alerts when you approach them

unlimitedReceipts.name: Unlimited Receipts
unlimitedReceipts.description: Process unlimited receipts per month without restrictions

prioritySupport.name: Priority Support
prioritySupport.description: Get priority customer support with faster response times

customCategories.name: Custom Categories

premium.cancelAnytime: Cancel anytime. No questions asked. Your data stays with you.

telegramLink.description: Connect your Telegram account to automatically track your expenses from receipt photos.

telegramLink.notLinkedYet: Not linked yet. Please send the token to the Telegram bot.

footer.builtWith: Built with Next.js, Supabase, and Shadcn UI

hero.title: Meet Tobby, Your Financial Companion
hero.description: Tobby automatically processes receipts via Telegram and gives you instant insights into your spending habits. Simple, friendly, and intelligent.

features.title: Everything you need to manage expenses

receipt.title: Smart Receipt Processing
receipt.description: Send receipt photos via Telegram and let AI automatically extract and categorize your expenses

analytics.title: Insightful Analytics
analytics.description: Visualize your spending patterns with intuitive charts and detailed breakdowns

security.title: Secure & Private
security.description: Your financial data is encrypted and protected with enterprise-grade security
